query:
INSERT INTO stream_ariata_ai_chat (
            id,
            source_id,
            conversation_id,
            message_id,
            role,
            content,
            model,
            provider,
            timestamp,
            metadata,
            created_at,
            updated_at
        ) VALUES (
            gen_random_uuid(),
            $1,
            $2,
            $3,
            $4,
            $5,
            $6,
            $7,
            $8,
            $9,
            NOW(),
            NOW()
        )
        ON CONFLICT (source_id, message_id)
        DO UPDATE SET
            content = EXCLUDED.content,
            model = EXCLUDED.model,
            provider = EXCLUDED.provider,
            timestamp = EXCLUDED.timestamp,
            metadata = EXCLUDED.metadata,
            updated_at = NOW()
